Does that mean the socket is still open while you go into sleep mode and times out when you resume?

(In reply to comment #2)
> Does that mean the socket is still open while you go into sleep mode and times
> out when you resume?

I think that's what I'm seeing, i.e. the errors don't pop up until the computer wakes up.  Eugene?
The calls to MylarStatusHandler seem to have been removed. Eugene, please reopen if you see this error again.
